sqlMap.statement: SELECT IPC.INV_PRT_CTRL_PK FROM INV_PRT_CTRL IPC WHERE IPC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IPC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IPC.CONSL_BILL_NUM = #conslBillNum# AND IPC.INV_PRT_CTRL_REC_CD = 'BILL'
SELECT IPC.INV_PRT_CTRL_PK FROM INV_PRT_CTRL IPC WHERE IPC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IPC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IPC.INV_NUM = #invNum#
